Description: A pipeline for running AMRfinderPlus and collating results into functional classes
EDAM_topic: Microbiology, Public health and epidemiology, Infectious disease
EDAM_topic_(no_superclasses): Microbiology, Public health and epidemiology, Infectious disease
bio.tool_description: an AMR gene detection pipeline that runs AMRFinderPlus on a single (or list ) of given isolates and collates the results into a table, separating genes identified into functionally relevant groups.
